name: Shibin Ragh
aboutMe: The coxswain of the boat steering the team with passionate goals and motivating approaches. He’s a hardcore left thinker and a diehard Neymar Jr. fan.

name: Siyad Sain
aboutMe: He’s a wanderer. Loves freaking out miles in his Suzuki Swift. The Evoque would be the next machine he will be investing time for riding adventures.

name: Divek
aboutMe: A Tom lover. Addicted to cartoon motion pictures even at this age. He is passionate in snapping wildlife beauties. A seldom alcohol researcher as well.

name: Niyas Khan
aboutMe: He never wants to miss a single match of CR7. A live match at Santiago Bernabéu is already in his to-do list. He also finds time to hunt adventurous snaps.

name: Bibin Babu
aboutMe: The artist by behaviour. Takes a detail in every observation he possesses. Tequila gives him wings at times. A hardcore Formula One and michael schumacher fan.

name: Nikhil Krshnan
aboutMe: The most charming in the hub. Loves coding on codepen.io, making short films, drawing cartoon sketches, and watching Will Smith on big screen.
